sections.text: Loss of recourse when purchaser fails to give judgment debtor timely noticeThe purchaser shall lose the right granted him by Article 2379 if a suit is filed to evict him and he neglects to notify the judgment debtor in time for him to defend the suit, and if the debtor could have successfully defended the suit.
